hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EBSA.EBSA_AREA_CODE, EBSA.EBSA_AREA_NAME_CN, EBSA.EBSA_PROVINCE_CODE, EBSA.EBSA_PROVINCE_NAME, EBSA.EBSA_CITY_CODE, EBSA.EBSA_CITY_NAME, EBSA.EBSA_DISTRICT_CODE, EBSA.EBSA_DISTRICT_NAME FROM EB_SERVICE_AREA EBSA WHERE EBSA.EBSA_TYPE IN ('2') AND EBSA.REC_STATUS = 0 <if !is_empty(areaCode, areaName, provinceName, cityName, districtName)> AND ( 1 = 2 << OR EBSA.EBSA_AREA_CODE LIKE '%' || :areaCode || '%' >> << OR EBSA.EBSA_AREA_NAME_CN LIKE '%' || :areaName || '%' >> << OR EBSA.EBSA_PROVINCE_NAME LIKE '%' || :provinceName || '%' >> << OR EBSA.EBSA_CITY_NAME LIKE '%' || :cityName || '%' >> << OR EBSA.EBSA_DISTRICT_NAME LIKE '%' || :districtName || '%' >> ) </if>
